author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is the backport of #34467 
Updating the `dqmEnv.subSystemFolder`, `dqmSaver.tag` and `dqmSaverPB.tag` names in the BeamMonitor (and FakeBeamMonitor).

#### PR validation:
Locally run the unit tests to confirm the changes in the output names.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
This PR is the backport of #34467
title: Fix BeamMonitor names in BeamSpot DQM clients [11_3_X]
